comment.text: The translation key "HideAuthPage" is used to display a label for a checkbox that allows users to hide the authentication page in the Portal Settings. This value appears as a label on a Checkbox component and can be translated to provide clarity for users in different languages.

usage.context:
<div className="advanced-block">
 <Checkbox
 id="hide-auth-page"
 className="checkbox-input"
 label={t("HideAuthPage")}
 name="hideAuthPage"
 isChecked={hideAuthPage}
 isDisabled={!enableSso || isLoadingXml}
 onChange={setCheckbox}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Doğrulama səhifəsini gizlədin" is a command form, implying an action to be performed. The English "Hide auth page" describes a setting or state. A more accurate translation would be something like "Gizli doğrulama səhifəsi" or "Doğrulama səhifəsi gizli" to reflect the setting being hidden, rather than instructing someone to hide it.

While technically correct, "Скриване на страницата за удостоверяване" is a very literal translation and sounds unnatural in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Скриване на страницата за удостоверяване" or "Скриване на екрана за вход" or "Скрито удостоверяване".

The translation "Skrýt stránky pro ověření" is not the most accurate or natural rendering of "Hide auth page". "Skrýt" (hide) is correct, but "stránky pro ověření" (pages for authentication) is too literal. A more natural translation would be something like "Skrýt přihlašovací stránku" (Hide login page) or "Skrýt stránku s přihlášením" (Hide the sign-in page).

The translation 'Թաքցնել իսկորոշման էջը' is a literal translation of 'Hide auth page'. While understandable, a more natural and commonly used phrasing in Armenian might be preferred. 'Համակողմանիչի մուտքի էջը թաքցնել' or 'Մուտքի էջը թաքցնել' could be better options depending on the specific context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Համակողմանիչի մուտքի էջը թաքցնել' or 'Մուտքի էջը թաքցնել'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ເຊື່ອງ ໜ້າການ ກວດສອບ" is a literal translation but might not be the most natural or accurate way to convey "Hide auth page" in Lao.  'ກວດສອບ' implies 'verification' or 'checking,' which isn't necessarily the core function being hidden.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "ເຊື່ອງ ໜ້າເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ" (Hide login page) or "ເຊື່ອງ ໜ້າຕ້ອນຮັບ" (Hide welcome page), depending on the exact context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ද්වි සාධක පිටුව සඟවන්න' (dvi sadhaka pituva sagavanna) is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Hide auth page' in a user-friendly way for a UI setting. It translates to 'Hide two-factor page'. The intended meaning refers to hiding the authentication page entirely, not just a two-factor page.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like 'අනතුරුපත් පිටුව සඟවන්න' (anantrupata pituva sagavanna) which means 'Hide the login page' or 'Authentication page' or 'Hide the sign-in page'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Skrij avtentikacijsko stran" is understandable, a more accurate and natural translation of "Hide auth page" would be "Skrij stran za prijavo" or "Skrij prijavno stran". "Avtentikacijsko stran" is technically correct but less commonly used in this context.
